version_description: Improvements
Minor bugs fixed.
Fixed bugs
Fixed a bug that could lead to an unexpected app crashes for some users.
fixed bugs

A lot of improvements for stable audio playing when app in background.
Fixed bugs.
bug fix
minor bugs fixed
fixed bugs

New app icon!
Fixed bugs.
New Icon.
bug fix
Introducing Watch Extension - control playback, view track title, last played stations list.
Stability improvements

Introducing our new radio app - Radio Alarm Clock.

In this update:
- improved stability;
- fixed minor ui glitches.
Bug fixes.
We update the app regularly so we can make it better for you. Get the latest version for all of the available features and improvements. Thanks for using!
We update the app regularly so we can make it better for you. Get the latest version for all of the available features and improvements. Thanks for using!
Fixed crash when adding a station in manual mode.
Improved stability.

Большое спасибо за отзывы и конструктивную критику!
По вашим просьбам добавили "Радио Книга", починили "Радонеж" и некоторые другие станции.
Поправили механизм сохранения статуса покупки, теперь не не придется постоянно восстанавливать покупку. 
Немного улучшили механизм для добавления новых станций, в той его части, которая определяет аудиопоток.
Еще мы переехали в новый дата-центр, гораздо более надежный, таких сбоев как последний (около месяца назад) больше не должно быть!


PS: в описании больше не будем использовать общие фразы, будем сообщать полный список изменений :) Спасибо!
Improved stability.
Player performance improvements.
Minor improvements.
Improved player stability for some audiostream types.
Fixed crash when adding a station in manual mode.

Hi all.
It's been a long time since we updated app, it's time to fix that.
In this update we improved the player component. It now supports more formats, works better, better handles incoming calls, better handles loss of internet connection, etc.
There will be many new things in the next updates. See you soon.
